data.name: BLAZMVVM0001_Title
data.value: ViewModel should inherit from ViewModelBase

data.name: BLAZMVVM0001_MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' should inherit from ViewModelBase, RecipientViewModelBase, or ValidatorViewModelBase

data.name: BLAZMVVM0001_Description
data.value: Classes ending with 'ViewModel' should inherit from one of the Blazing.Mvvm base classes to ensure proper MVVM pattern implementation and lifecycle management.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0002_Title
data.value: ViewModel must have ViewModelDefinition attribute

data.name: BLAZMVVM0002_MessageFormat
data.value: Type '{0}' must be decorated with [ViewModelDefinition] attribute for dependency injection registration

data.name: BLAZMVVM0002_Description
data.value: ViewModels that inherit from ViewModelBase must be decorated with the [ViewModelDefinition] attribute to ensure proper dependency injection registration and service lifetime configuration.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0003_Title
data.value: Component should inherit from MvvmComponentBase

data.name: BLAZMVVM0003_MessageFormat
data.value: Component '{0}' with ViewModel property should inherit from MvvmComponentBase<TViewModel>

data.name: BLAZMVVM0003_Description
data.value: Blazor components that have a ViewModel property should inherit from MvvmComponentBase<TViewModel> to ensure automatic ViewModel injection, proper lifecycle management, and state synchronization.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0004_Title
data.value: ViewParameter must have matching Component parameter

data.name: BLAZMVVM0004_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' with [ViewParameter] attribute must have a matching [Parameter] property in the associated component

data.name: BLAZMVVM0004_Description
data.value: Properties decorated with [ViewParameter] attribute must have corresponding [Parameter] properties in the associated component to maintain proper data flow between Views and ViewModels.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0005_Title
data.value: Navigation target must be a registered ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0005_MessageFormat
data.value: NavigateTo<{0}>() references a type that is not registered with [ViewModelDefinition] or has no associated route

data.name: BLAZMVVM0005_Description
data.value: Navigation calls must reference ViewModels that are properly registered with [ViewModelDefinition] and have associated routable components to prevent runtime navigation failures.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0006_Title
data.value: ViewModelKey must match registered ViewModel name

data.name: BLAZMVVM0006_MessageFormat
data.value: [ViewModelKey] attribute value '{0}' does not match any registered ViewModel type name

data.name: BLAZMVVM0006_Description
data.value: The [ViewModelKey] attribute value must exactly match the name of a registered ViewModel type to ensure proper ViewModel resolution at runtime.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0007_Title
data.value: Consider overriding lifecycle methods in ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0007_MessageFormat
data.value: Component '{0}' overrides lifecycle method '{1}' - consider moving logic to ViewModel lifecycle methods

data.name: BLAZMVVM0007_Description
data.value: Business logic in component lifecycle methods should be moved to corresponding ViewModel lifecycle methods to maintain proper separation of concerns in MVVM architecture.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0008_Title
data.value: Property should use ObservableProperty attribute

data.name: BLAZMVVM0008_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' with backing field should use [ObservableProperty] attribute instead of manual SetProperty calls

data.name: BLAZMVVM0008_Description
data.value: Properties with backing fields and manual SetProperty calls should use the [ObservableProperty] attribute from CommunityToolkit.Mvvm to reduce boilerplate code and improve maintainability.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0009_Title
data.value: Service may not be registered in DI container

data.name: BLAZMVVM0009_MessageFormat
data.value: Constructor parameter '{0}' of type '{1}' may not be registered in the dependency injection container

data.name: BLAZMVVM0009_Description
data.value: Constructor parameters in ViewModels should reference services that are registered in the dependency injection container to prevent runtime resolution failures.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0010_Title
data.value: Page should have associated ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0010_MessageFormat
data.value: Page component '{0}' with @page directive should have an associated ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0010_Description
data.value: Blazor page components with @page directive should have an associated ViewModel to maintain consistent MVVM architecture across routable pages.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0011_Title
data.value: MvvmNavLink must reference valid ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0011_MessageFormat
data.value: MvvmNavLink references ViewModel '{0}' that is not registered or has no associated route

data.name: BLAZMVVM0011_Description
data.value: MvvmNavLink components must reference ViewModels that are properly registered with [ViewModelDefinition] and have associated routable components for type-safe navigation.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0012_Title
data.value: Method should be converted to RelayCommand

data.name: BLAZMVVM0012_MessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' called from View should be converted to a command using [RelayCommand] attribute

data.name: BLAZMVVM0012_Description
data.value: Methods called directly from Views should be converted to commands using the [RelayCommand] attribute to follow MVVM command pattern and enable features like CanExecute logic.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0013_Title
data.value: Consider using MvvmOwningComponentBase for scoped services

data.name: BLAZMVVM0013_MessageFormat
data.value: Component '{0}' with ViewModel '{1}' that implements IDisposable should inherit from MvvmOwningComponentBase<TViewModel>

data.name: BLAZMVVM0013_Description
data.value: Components with ViewModels that implement IDisposable or use scoped services should inherit from MvvmOwningComponentBase<TViewModel> to ensure proper service scope and disposal management.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0014_Title
data.value: Unnecessary StateHasChanged call detected

data.name: BLAZMVVM0014_MessageFormat
data.value: StateHasChanged call after '{0}' is unnecessary when using ObservableProperty - automatic UI updates are handled by the framework

data.name: BLAZMVVM0014_Description
data.value: Manual StateHasChanged calls are unnecessary when using ObservableProperty attributes, as the MVVM framework automatically triggers UI updates when observable properties change.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0015_Title
data.value: ViewModel should implement IDisposable

data.name: BLAZMVVM0015_MessageFormat
data.value: ViewModel '{0}' uses disposable resources but does not implement IDisposable pattern

data.name: BLAZMVVM0015_Description
data.value: ViewModels that use disposable resources such as subscriptions, timers, or unmanaged resources should implement IDisposable to ensure proper cleanup and prevent memory leaks.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0016_Title
data.value: Messenger registration may cause memory leak

data.name: BLAZMVVM0016_MessageFormat
data.value: Messenger.Register call in '{0}' is not unregistered - consider calling Unregister in Dispose or use RecipientViewModelBase

data.name: BLAZMVVM0016_Description
data.value: Messenger registrations should be unregistered when the ViewModel is disposed to prevent memory leaks. Consider using RecipientViewModelBase which handles registration lifetime automatically.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0017_Title
data.value: Async method should use AsyncRelayCommand

data.name: BLAZMVVM0017_MessageFormat
data.value: Async method '{0}' with [RelayCommand] should use AsyncRelayCommand instead of async void to properly handle exceptions

data.name: BLAZMVVM0017_Description
data.value: Asynchronous command methods should return Task and use AsyncRelayCommand instead of async void to enable proper exception handling, cancellation support, and execution state tracking.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0018_Title
data.value: Consider using NotifyPropertyChangedFor attribute

data.name: BLAZMVVM0018_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' is referenced in '{1}' - consider adding [NotifyPropertyChangedFor(nameof({1}))] to '{0}' for automatic notification

data.name: BLAZMVVM0018_Description
data.value: When one property change affects another computed property, use the [NotifyPropertyChangedFor] attribute to automatically notify dependents instead of manually calling OnPropertyChanged.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0019_Title
data.value: Prefer Inject over CascadingParameter for services

data.name: BLAZMVVM0019_MessageFormat
data.value: Property '{0}' with [CascadingParameter] should use [Inject] instead for dependency injection services

data.name: BLAZMVVM0019_Description
data.value: Dependency injection services should be injected using [Inject] attribute in ViewModels rather than [CascadingParameter] to maintain clear separation between component hierarchy state and service dependencies.

data.name: BLAZMVVM0020_Title
data.value: Route parameter should be bound to ViewModel

data.name: BLAZMVVM0020_MessageFormat
data.value: Route parameter '{0}' in @page directive should have matching [ViewParameter] property in ViewModel '{1}'

data.name: BLAZMVVM0020_Description
data.value: Route parameters defined in @page directive should have corresponding [ViewParameter] properties in the ViewModel to ensure proper parameter binding and maintain MVVM data flow.
